jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description1: • Working as a full-stack developer on a web application used by all collection staff throughout Statistics Canada.
jobs.description2: • Worked with two other developers to add ReactJs and GraphQL into the napplication by setting up the necessary configurations and infrastructure.
jobs.description3:
• Lead developer for a new dashboard feature. Responsible of managing the
development process for other developers and communication with clients.
jobs.description4:
• Successfully got a proof of concept approved to integrate automated testing
as part of the development process using Cypress framework.

jobs.title: General Assembler
jobs.description1:
• Assembled Luminol cells and TNT pens for explosive and narcotic detection
units.
jobs.description2: • Prepared various narcotic samples for testing by chemical engineers.

jobs.title: Racquet Stringer
jobs.description1:
• Started a racquet stringing business at one tennis club and expanded to
three clubs throughout the city.
